original_text: Thus Hezekiah did throughout all Judah, and he did what was good and right and faithful before the Lord his God.
korean_text: 히스기야가 온 유다에 이같이 행하되 그의 하나님 여호와 보시기에 선과 정의와 진실함으로 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: Thus Hezekiah did throughout all Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 히스기야는 온 유다에서 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and he did what was good and right and faithful
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 선하고 옳고 신실한 일을 행하였으며
